short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes certain Trello forms more readable and therefore useful.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For users of Trello who have hard time reading the cards descriptions and finding the important details. It is a first version and only adjusting few things on the cards. As for example, moving the buttons out of the main dialog window.
